page.title: 06Forestry
page.content: In the steep sided valley of the Washford River in the North of this Block there is an important{Forestry {Commission Plantation. }This provides {employment}for as many as 20 people. It covers about about 8,000 acres and the trees are planted at a density of about 800 to the acre. It is a {coniferous}plantation with trees like {Sitka Spruce and Douglas Fir}being very important. When we went to the Forest we saw lots of big{ants}and ants nests. There are some{squirrels}but they are all grey squirrels because the red squirrels have been chased out of their territory by the grey ones. There are{fallow deer, roe deer {and red deer. }They have to control the numbers of red deer so they don't spoil the trees or the neighbouring farmers crops.
